text: :wave: hey team! i was hoping to get confirmation that the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification|visitor identification API> is the _only_ way to identify logged-in visitors in chat, and that it is _only_ available on pro+ plans? this is a must-have for most support chat solutions, and i have never seen it paywalled in this way, so i think i must be missing some kind of workaround or something
